author: Itachi
quote: Knowledge and awareness are vague, and perhaps better called illusions.

quote: We are unique siblings. I am the barrier you must overcome, so you and I will continue to exist together.

author: Itachi
quote: I always lied to you telling you to forgive me. I used these hands to keep you at distance… I did not want you to get involved. But now… I think you could have changed father and mother."

author: Itachi
quote: We do not know what kind of people we truly are until the moment before our deaths. As death comes to embrace you, you will realize what you are. That’s what death is, don’t you think?

author: Itachi
quote: Those who turn their hands against their comrades are sure to die a terrible death."

author: Itachi
quote: People’s lives don’t end when they die, they end when they lose faith.

author: Itachi
quote: In this moment, I am euphoric. Not because of any phony Shinobi’s blessing. But because I’m enlightened by my intelligence.

author: Itachi
quote: Any technique is worthless before my eyes."

author: Itachi
quote: No, it means to forgive yourself for what you aren’t able to do. Your comrades are there to make up for what you cannot do and to prevent you from ignoring things that you actually might have been able to do.

author: Itachi
quote: The village does have its dark side and its inconsistencies, but I’m still Konoha’s Itachi Uchiha.

author: Itachi
quote: I actually don’t think something like perfection exists. That is I think why we are born able to absorb things… and by comparing ourselves with something else we can finally head in a good direction."

author: Itachi
quote: No single thing is perfect by itself. That’s why we’re born to attract other things to make up for what we lack."

author: Itachi
quote: I’ll admit that you’re stronger than before. But because of that, you seem to have lost sight of what’s truly important. Now listen carefully. The people of the village, who once abhorred you, have begun to admire you. They think of you as a comrade. It’s because you fought hard for their acceptance. You once said it was everyone who cares about you who helped you get where you are now. If you forget others because you have power, and become arrogant and egotistical, you’ll eventually become just like Madara. No matter how powerful you become, do not try to shoulder everything alone. Becoming the Hokage doesn’t mean people will acknowledge you. But when the people acknowledge you, you can become Hokage. Never forget your friends.

author: Itachi
quote: It’s never been “The one who becomes Hokage will be acknowledged by everyone”, it’s “The one who is acknowledged by everyone, becomes the Hokage

author: Itachi
quote: Self-sacrifice… A nameless shinobi who protects peace within its shadow. That is a true shinobi."

author: Itachi
quote: We are humans, not fish.

author: Itachi
quote: Those who cannot acknowledge themselves, will eventually fail.

author: Itachi
quote: People live their lives bound by what they accept as correct and true. That’s how they define “reality.”

author: Itachi
quote: Obsessed with the organization, obsessed with the clan, obsessed with our lineage… A worthless compulsion that enslaves us and limits our capabilities, leading us to fear what you don’t understand.

author: Itachi
quote: So this time, for once, let me tell you one small truth.

author: Gaara
quote: People cannot win against their loneliness."

quote: Just because someone is important to you, it doesn’t necessarily mean that that person is good.

quote: You can make a rain of 1,000 needles. I will make it rain blood.

quote: There are no enemies here because we’ve all suffered at Akatsuki’s hand! So there is no Suna, no Iwa, no Konoha, no Kiri, and no Kumo! There are only shinobi!

quote: I am a relic they want to get rid of, so why do I exist and live?

quote: Your eyes tell me how badly you wish to kill the one who put you through the hell called loneliness."

author: Gaara
quote: I shall kill you. I will not cease to exist."

quote: We’ve fought world wars for our own nations, our own villages. We’ve hurt one another. We’ve hated one another. That hatred bred a lust for power, and that lust for power created me.

author: Kakashi
quote: “Don’t look away. When you live like a shinobi, this is how it ends.”

author: Kakashi
quote: As long as you don’t give up, you can still be saved!”

author: Kakashi
quote: “The next generation will always surpass the previous one. It is one of the never-ending cycles in life.”

author: Kakashi
quote: “Those who break the rules are scum, but those who abandon their friends are worse than scum.”

author: Kakashi
quote: “The hole in one’s heart gets filled by others around you.”

author: Kakashi
quote: “Sorry I’m late; I’m afraid I got lost on the path of life”

author: Kakashi
quote: “I won’t allow my comrades to die. I’ll protect you with my life. Trust me”

author: Kakashi
quote: “Forget about revenge. The fate of those who seek revenge is grim. It’s tragic; you will end up suffering and hurting yourself even more.”

author: Kakashi
quote: “In society, those who don’t have many abilities tend to complain more.”

quote: “I’m Hatake Kakashi. Things I like and things I hate? I don’t feel like telling you that… my dreams for the future? Never really thought about that. As for my hobbies… I have lots of hobbies.”

author: Kakashi
quote: “Behind this mask is…Another mask! Pretty cool, huh?”

author: Kakashi
quote: “I miss the cute students who’d react to every little thing I say.”

author: Kakashi
quote: “To know what is right and choose to ignore it is the act of a coward”

author: Kakashi
quote: “Walking down a path without knowing where you really want to go… Having a grace period like that isn’t so bad.”

author: Kakashi
quote: “Even if you do succeed in getting revenge, the only thing that remains is emptiness.”

author: Kakashi
quote: “Some people want power, and they get mad when they don’t get it. They take their fury out on everyone else. You don’t want it; it becomes you.”

author: Kakashi
quote: “If I’m still sane by the time I finish their training, it’ll be a miracle.”

quote: All I fell prey to was Lord Orochimaru’s magnificent way of thinking.

quote: The more you want something, the harder it is to wait for it.

quote: Not having things in proper order annoys me to no end...

author: Madara
quote: Wake up to reality! Nothing ever goes as planned in this world. The longer you live, the more you realize that in this reality, only pain, suffering, and futility exist.

author: Madara
quote: People cannot show each other their true feelings fear suspicion and resentment never subside.

author: Madara
quote: In this world, wherever there is light - there are also shadows. As long as the concept of winners exists, there must also be losers. The selfish desire of wanting to maintain peace causes wars, and hatred is born to protect love.

author: Madara
quote: Love is not necessary; power is the only true necessity.

author: Madara
quote: When a man learns to love, he must bear the risk of hatred.

author: Madara
quote: Talking about peace, whilst spilling blood, it's something that only humans can do.

author: Madara
quote: When you fall in love, you love with all that you’ve got. You must learn to bear anger, hatred, keep your ego and attitude aside and handle things with care, calmness, and love.

author: Madara
quote: Love and hate are two sides of the same coin.

author: Madara
quote: Human beings are nothing but a medium of the general process of carrying out life. They do want to live in peace, but want to win it over by war because ultimately victory is what brings them peace.

author: Madara
quote: The concept of hope is nothing more than giving up. A word that holds no true meaning.

author: Madara
quote: I’d be lying if I said things are going according to my plan, but beggars can’t be choosers, right?

author: Madara
quote: It seems that you still want to dance, but… You will not be able to make steps anymore.

author: Madara
quote: Love is an essential element, but not everyone gets it. It’s okay not to have love, but to survive in this world, you need to make yourself capable and achieve success. That’s where you actually stand.

author: Madara
quote: Would you consider dying together 'teamwork' as well?

author: Madara
quote: Man seeks peace, yet at the same time yearning for war... Those are the two realms belonging solely to man.

author: Madara
quote: Nine-Tails, you are merely a momentary life, a temporary existence of coalesced energy, the energy that once was a single, ultimate form.

author: Orochimaru
quote: Hate only gives birth to even more hate.

author: Orochimaru
quote: Real power is forged from the desire smouldering in the heart. It fans into a flame and begins to burn with an intensity scarcely imagined to be possible.

author: Orochimaru
quote: When I watch this boy, I look back to the time I was called a genius, and think how ridiculous it was.

author: Orochimaru
quote: I refuse…to let this happen! I am Orochimaru! I am immortal! I will not die here! Destined to discover the true meaning behind everything! Destined to take control of everything in this world!!

author: Orochimaru
quote: When there is a true desire in the heart and that desire is strong… That is when he finds real strength that even he did not know he had!

author: Orochimaru
quote: What nonsense! In the grand scheme of time, you’re nothing more than a trivial footnote in the brief history of a cluster of huts called the “Leaf Village”! In time, the Hokage Stone Faces will crumble and be worn down to nothing.

author: Orochimaru
quote: This child… intrigues me to no end!

author: Orochimaru
quote: How impressive. A thousand foes stand before you and you don’t even bat an eyelid.

author: Orochimaru
quote: I want to obtain all the jutsu and gain a true understanding of everything in this world. The first one to mix blue and yellow called the new color “green”. I want to do something similar to that. If blue is the chakra, then yellow is the seal, and green is the jutsu… Just as there is no end to the variety of colors, there are so many thousands…tens of thousands of jutsu in the world as well. But in order to obtain every possible jutsu and truth, it would require an eternity. Only one who understands everything after spending such time on this can be fittingly called the Ultimate Being.

author: Orochimaru
quote: The best medicines always taste bitter.

author: Orochimaru
quote: Maybe, just maybe, there is no purpose in life… but if you linger a while longer in this world, you might discover something of value in it.

author: Orochimaru
quote: There probably isn’t any meaning in life. Perhaps you can find something interesting to do while you are alive. Like how you found that flower. Like how I found you.

author: Orochimaru
quote: It’s human nature not to realize the true value of something, unless they lose it.

author: Orochimaru
quote: Either people change or they die before they do. It’s one or the other.

author: Orochimaru
quote: Darkness. When everything that you know and love is taken away from you so harshly. All you can think about is anger, hatred and even revenge. And no one can save you.

author: Orochimaru
quote: Aging is pointless. That’s how I feel when I look at you.

author: Shino
quote: Trying to improve by learning from others that is what calls friendship.

author: Shino
quote: If you fight me, you won't be able to recover. Forfeit and withdraw.

author: Shino
quote: Never underestimate your opponent, no matter how small they may seem.

author: Shino
quote: Even if it's been a while, you should remember your comrades faces. Why? Because otherwise you will hurt their feelings when they call out to you.

author: Shino
quote: I hate explaining the same thing twice.

author: Shino
quote: This is what a real trump card is.
